computedFields.name: LeadAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('IsConverted' == "false") then daysBetween(toDate(CreatedDate__c_sec_epoch), now())  else daysBetween(toDate(ConvertedDate_day_epoch), toDate(CreatedDate__c_day_epoch))  end
computedFields.label: Lead Age in Days

computedFields.name: OpportunityAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ConvertedOpportunity.Name' is null) then 0 when ('ConvertedOpportunity.IsClosed' == "false") then ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate__c_sec_epoch')/86400  else ('ConvertedOpportunity.CloseDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate__c_sec_epoch')/86400 end
computedFields.label: Total Opportunity Age

computedFields.name: IsPushed
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('CloseDatePrev' is not null) && ('CloseDatePrev' < 'CloseDate') then 1 else 0 end

computedFields.name: IsPulled
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('CloseDatePrev' is not null) && ('CloseDatePrev' > 'CloseDate') then 1 else 0 end

computedFields.name: Duration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ValidToDate' == "3000-01-01T00:00:00.000Z" then     date_diff("second",toDate('ValidFromDate',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'"), now())     else     date_diff("second",toDate('ValidFromDate',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'"), toDate('ValidToDate',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'"))     end
computedFields.label: Duration

computedFields.name: IsClosed
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when daysBetween(toDate(ActivityDate, "yyyy-MM-dd"), now()) >= 0 then "true" else "false" end
computedFields.label: IsClosed

computedFields.name: DaysSinceLastActivity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case    when LastActivityDate is null      then daysBetween(toDate(substr(LastModifiedDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now())   when LastModifiedDate > LastActivityDate     then daysBetween(toDate(substr(LastModifiedDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now())   else daysBetween(toDate(substr(LastActivityDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now()) end
computedFields.label: Days Since Last Activity

computedFields.name: OpportunityAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case    when IsClosed == "false"     then daysBetween(toDate(substr(CreatedDate__c, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now())     else daysBetween(toDate(substr(CreatedDate__c, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"),toDate(substr(CloseDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"))     end
computedFields.label: Opportunity Age
